column5: * Microsoft partners with Primus Power to drive energy innovation at datacenters

column4: Microsoft opposes U.S. labor board ruling on contract worker rights
column5: Microsoft Corp has asked a federal court to throw out a ruling by a U.S. labor board extending the responsibility of companies for contract workers  arguing that the case would have big implications for the technology company.

column4: BRIEF-Microsoft acquires messaging app developer Wand Labs
column5: * Wand team a "great fit" to join bing engineering and platform team  especially with ongoing work on area of intelligent agents  chat bots  Source text - http://bit.ly/1ZTP0BM Further company coverage:

column4: Microsoft opposes U.S. labor board ruling on contract worker rights
column5: June 15 Microsoft Corp has asked a federal court to throw out a ruling by a U.S. labor board extending the responsibility of companies for contract workers  arguing that the case would have big implications for the technology company.
